  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/618</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La peixateria</string>
            <string language="en">The fishmonger's</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Des Fischhändlers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le poissonnier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fishmonger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fishmonger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fishmonger</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció d'activitats de zoologia sobre la classificació i anatomia d'invertebrats i vertebrats aqüàtics. Conté  activitats per a fer a l'aula i d'altres interactives, protocols de pràctiques i exercicis.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of zoological activities on the classification and anatomy of aquatic invertebrates and vertebrates. The unit includes classroom and interactive activities, instructions and exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">invertebrat</string>
            <string language="en">invertebrate</string>
            <string language="es">invertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vertebrat</string>
            <string language="en">vertebrate</string>
            <string language="es">vertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">zoologia</string>
            <string language="en">zoology</string>
            <string language="es">zoología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der zoologischen Aktivitäten auf der 
Klassifikation und Anatomie der Wasserwirbelloser Tiere und der 
Wirbeltiere. Die Maßeinheit enthält Klassenzimmer und 
interaktive Aktivitäten, Anweisungen und Übungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des activités zoologiques sur la 
classification et anatomie des invertébrés et des vertébrés 
aquatiques. L'unité inclut la salle de classe et les 
activités, les instructions et les exercices interactifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção de atividades zoological na 
classificação e anatomy de invertebrados e de vertebrados 
aquáticos. A unidade inclui a sala de aula e atividades, 
instruções e exercícios interativos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione delle attività zoologiche sulla 
classificazione ed anatomia degli invertebrati e dei vertebrati 
acquatici. L'unità include l'aula ed attività, istruzioni ed 
esercitazioni interattive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των ζωολογικών δραστηριοτήτων στην ταξινόμηση 
και την ανατομία των υδρόβιων ασπόνδυλων και των σπονδυλωτών. 
Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει την τάξη και τις διαλογικές 
δραστηριότητες, τις οδηγίες και τις ασκήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wirbellos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirbeltier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zoologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">invertébré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vertébré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zoologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">invertebrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">zoology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invertebrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vertebrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zoologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ασπόνδυλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σπονδυλωτό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
